ProcessingMods library

Purpose

Built for Processing 3, Mods are pieces of Java code with inputs and outputs that can be interconnected. This can help you draw more complex animations, amongst others.

For a detailed description, see https://commonpike.github.io/nl.kw.processing.mods/dist/ProcessingMods.pdf

Platforms

All

Dependencies

Processing

Version

Tested with Processing 3

Source code

https://github.com/commonpike/nl.kw.processing.mods

Keywords

Utilities, Processing3, Library

Last Update

read the properties file

Download

https://commonpike.github.io/nl.kw.processing.mods/dist/ProcessingMods.zip
